snippet: The F.B.I. director, James B. Comey, said the bureau was looking into accusations that Department of Veterans Affairs officials had manipulated medical waiting lists.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation opens criminal probe into accusations that Veterans Affairs Dept officials manipulated medical waiting lists and delayed care for thousands of veterans.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. director, James B. Comey, said the bureau was looking into accusations that Department of Veterans Affairs officials had manipulated medical waiting lists.

headline.main: F.B.I. Begins Criminal Inquiry in V.A. Scandal
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Has Begun Criminal Inquiry in V.A. Scandal
